author: timesunion.com
title: Summaries
text:
Photo: Hans Pennink Image 1 of / 2 Caption

Image 1 of 2 Shaker's defense tackles La Salle's Ryan Moore (25) for a loss during the first half of their high school football game in Troy, N.Y., Friday, Oct. 2, 2015. (Hans Pennink / Special to the Times Union) ORG XMIT: HP111
Photo: Hans Pennink Shaker's defense tackles La Salle's Ryan Moore (25) for a loss... Image 2 of 2 Green Tech's Raki Johnson, right, catches a touchdown pass as Burnt Hills' Matthew DeLano, left, and Jacob Shippey defend during their football game against Burnt Hills on Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, at Burnt Hill High in Burnt Hills, N.Y. (Cindy Schultz / Times Union)
